result.title: Website with protocols, planning and reporting tools for Long-term Arctic Environmental Observational Nodes (T1.2)
result.description: A website providing sampling and analysis protocols as well as planning and reporting tools will be established. The contents will be based on experience and materials from the Pacific Distributed Biological Observatory System, dialogue with European and other Arctic marine observational institutions, and existing protocols from MOSAIC, SAS, Nansen LEGACY and other sources

result.title: Regional sea ice information tool developed (T4.3)
result.description: An interactive visualization webpage for sea-ice (extent and area) time series is developed and accessible online. It is based on Ocean and Sea Ice Satellite Application Facility (OSI SAF) sea-ice data, and offers both hemispheric and regional indexes
